name: Final Fee
description:
Final Fee is a short text adventure game about trying to make as much money as you can before your death.

In 7 days, you will die. It is your goal to leave behind enough money for your family to sustain themselves after you are gone, at least for a while.

Use WS or the arrow keys to select menu options to determine what you will do and where you will go. Select an option with Enter.

To check the schedule, inventory, and time left, mouse over the question mark icon in the top right corner or hold the ? key.

Performing actions expends energy. When your fatigue meter is full, you will pass out. You can restore energy by sleeping at home.

Make good choices.

Created for Jame Gam #18. The theme was "Time is money" and the special item was "a clip."

Thanks very much to those who helped playtest the project:
Alec, Fett, Gary, Pop, Terrain, Yodite
